The comment down there Holy shit
Point is, this doujin chose the most expendable set of girls to incorporate into a NTR plot. If even the sex can't save it, this ones going in the dumpster fire. Complete fucking trash.

Don't even get me started on those shitty ass stiff looking facial epxressions. It's literally just slight variants of the same face with little adjustments to the position of the eyebrows, shape of the pupils, and how agape the mouth is. When it comes to the NTR aspect of things, I'd like to think I despise from the bottom of my fucking soul. So when I see a NTR doujin like shinobu prostituting herself and fucking some trash talking piece of shit you bet your ass my snowflake ass is gonna get triggered. But when it comes to this doujin, what the fuck? You think I give a shit about these women, much less Araragi? Shinobu, Hachikuji, and Tsubasa (Yotsugi's more of a add-on, but she's still loved) are the main girls who would most impact Araragi's emotional state. It's not like Araragi would give a shit if Senjougahara suddenly started fucking Kanbaru's lesbian ass, hell that's just a burden off his shoulders.

I know over-analyzing hentai doujins on it's own sounds dumb as shit. But this is the Monogatari series. When it comes to doujins for this series I'm not gonna accept your typical 'fuck and go' kind of story like that's all the characters of this series are worth. Compared to the other doujins on this website, including the ones I hate, thid doujin is by far one of the most lack luster and uncreative I've seen in terms of both plot and fap material. It's not like the H-element of this story is anything special, it's just a plain blowjob with no real impact and three of the most vanilla positions with the most deadbeat angles you could for a sex scene; overhead, front, and underside.

That's nice and all but 1. He has no 'intimate' relationship with his sisters, although he gets frisky sometimes, it's only in the moment 2. He doesn't really treat his 'relationship' (which he was essentially forced into) with Senjougahara very seriously anyhow seeing as how he pretty much still ogles literally any other girl BUT her 3. He's literally a vampire but holds himself back for the sake of his humanity and 4. he's got a perfectly loyal vampire waifu bound to his shadow/soul (and I wish I could same the same for hachikuji and yotsugi, but they both kind of drift away). Overall, everything in this doujin is null through all above points. Extra: 5. Kanbaru doesn't have a dick. 6. Araragi can throw objects like oversized bullets and can just pick her off at a distance. Watch any of the first movies to truly see how he deals with enemies MUCH stronger than Kanbaru.
It's almost scary how well people think ntr fits into this series. But then again with crab thot here...
